reviews.comment: The Pro service is working great, thanks!

reviews.title: update kill
reviews.comment: whats happened? worked amazingly but the update has ruined it!
reviews.author: Josh Knight

reviews.title: Mediocre
reviews.comment: Your update has turned a great app into a below average app all my pro choices and all countries servers just disappear what the hell is going on please fix ASAP.
reviews.author: jason ezard

reviews.title: GOOD
reviews.comment: GOOD APP, Definitely worth going PRO. Lets hope it stays safe and TRUSTWORTHY!
reviews.author: Omar Rafie

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Its fast smooth and amazing. I can now easily stream videos on YouTube .thumbs up to the developers. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Daniyal Ahmad

reviews.title: Doesnt work for UK
reviews.comment: Bought the pro version to connect to UK as am in spain and want sky go and netflix, can\'t connect to either of them and displays error messages consistent with what i was getting before trying VPN. Had pro version for 4 mins and am now uninstalling. Would like a refund please
reviews.author: Andy Siebert

reviews.comment: When it connects it\'s great. Have paid for pro, it\'s an upgrade in app. Sometimes it won\'t connect and doesn\'t give a hint as to why. Would be useful as sometimes like in China the vpn can be blocked.
reviews.author: David Hewson

reviews.title: Best vpn
reviews.comment: This is so far the easiest and most trust worthy vpn that I\'ve found that actually works, not just says it works. And for under $5 for pro? I say buy this and get yourself a cheeseburger and drink from. McDonald\'s and begun surfing the Web secure! Great job guys.
reviews.author: Me Yes

reviews.title: UK server not working!
reviews.comment: Connection to UK is successful but causes the Play Store to force close every time I open it. Connecting to other proxies such as Italy work perfectly with it. I didn\'t buy Pro just to have a faulty proxy.
reviews.author: Tommy Wooding Jr

reviews.title: Randomly Disconnectsm
reviews.comment: Continues to randomly disconnect, even after their last \"Fix\" leaving my downloads unprotected. Avoid unless you want to watch it constantly. I just can\'t trust it yet!
reviews.author: James Yates

reviews.title: Space waster
reviews.comment: Will not upgrade. Pro version not on Google play search engine won\'t find it. Free version does not connect to anything. Click on home page in Google play sends u to a nothing page that requires your email. Did Google search on Internet went to several of first listed sites. Didn\'t find anything...REPLY TO REPLY: No you can not!!!  READ MY REVIEW. Tapping on the bar gets Oops can\'t do it. Try again in few seconds. EVERY TIME.
reviews.author: Sam Hill

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Bought UK Pro to be able to watch Netflix and BBC iPlayer but when I check my IP it says Germany and won\'t let me access them sites. Seems like a nice app but will only give 5 stars when this is fixed. Now fixed and working perfectly, very good service, highly recommended. Especially with how fast the problem was fixed.
reviews.author: Denis Rastorguev

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Samsung Galaxy S3  Worked well on my phone. My location is currently in China and they moved my location to Poland.  So far I tried to open facebook and it works. Keep up the good job!! :)
reviews.author: Melissa Nindyawati

reviews.title: Works like a champion from China
reviews.comment: My last trip to China was frustrating without Google Maps, Facebook, Twitter, et al.  This trip I bought this App and upgraded to Pro. Everything works just like at home.
reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

reviews.title: Stops working at random
reviews.comment: I will start a download and set my device down. When I come back the app is no longer running and my ip is back in the good ole US of A. This is contrary to the apps description. don\'t pay for the pro version intil you have used this on a few times. Trust me.
reviews.author: Brian Edwards

reviews.title: Xperia s
reviews.comment: Ausam app love it now I can streem videos on youtube with high speed
reviews.author: Teejay Dimpi

reviews.title: hack my mail?
reviews.comment: my gmail hacked n logon by someone from Tunisia a day after i used this apps. n he spread spam mails to my mailing contacts.  reply: i didnt open email using browser but by email apps on default android. it autosync n connect through vpn when i turn vpn on
reviews.author: riana kusuma
